meetingInfo.name: Weekly
meetingInfo.peoplePresent: Sucren, Vanessa, Peter, love, cjfrankie , Onyeka

workingDocs.title: SNET Onboarding WG Task Reward Sheet
Onboarding WG - how can we support other WGs to onboard new people in their meetings
Session plan for Onboarding sessions with other WGs

agendaItems.townHallUpdates:
-Results from survey - quick outline, thank people for participating, and share doc
-Our quarterly report - share it
-Continuous onboarding sessions - say that analysis is coming, and thank the WGs we spoke to
-Say when our next meeting is (11th January 2024)
issues: The changes made to the Getting Started Twitter thread

actionItems.text: Sucren  to paraphrase the comments in the FAQ.
Vani to meet Tevo and Tommy and try getting them to drop their feedback on the Continuous Onboarding Survey on Miro.
Vani to speak to Tevo on inputting the necessary changes to the Getting Started Channel
Love and Onyeka to create an infographic for the Twitter thread Doc.
Peter to speak to Fly and try getting him to asynchronously drop his feedback on the Continuous Onboarding Survey on Miro
Sucren to speak to Tommy and try getting him to asynchronously drop his feedback on the Continuous Onboarding Survey on Miro.

decisionItems.decision: We agreed on rotating the meeting facilitation in Q1 of 2024.
We agreed to present the Survey analysis in the next Town Hall
We agreed to take this meeting as the last meeting of the year
We agreed to present the Q4 Quarterly report in the next Town Hall

discussionPoints: Twitter thread on the Getting started channel
learningPoints: Due to the possibility of the AGIX token depreciating in price, it would be wise to plan for the worst case scenario while planning on Q1 Budget.

tags.topicsCovered: Guilds , Onboarding, TH Update , Roles, Budget
tags.other: Cjfrankie receives the Onboarding Workgroup tag on Discord, Kent to get the Onboarding Workgroup tag, if he attends the next meeting

workingDocs.title: Onboarding support for other workgroups Google doc

agendaItems.townHallUpdates:
-Launch of the Onboarding survey form.
-Collaboration with the Gamers Guild.
issues: Question of how to practically use the meeting summary tool

actionItems.text: Sucre to tweak the scripts and relay the imagery for the onboarding video to LilyCupcake
Sucre to share our Commissioning Video clips Google doc
Sucre to meet Workgroup leads and discuss when we can visit their meetings to discuss onboarding.
Vani and Onyeka to make changes to the survey form as discussed in the meeting.
Sucre to create a sign-up sheet for visits to other WGs to discuss onboarding
Lady Tempestt to make necessary corrections to the Twitter thread Doc.
Sucre to send the Twitter thread Doc to Mikasa in the writers workgroup once it's finished
Sucre to change the cover photo of the Getting started Doc
Vani to add an FAQ on "What are GMBLs" to the Getting started Doc.
Sucre to add an FAQ on "How do I get rewarded?"
Onyeka to add an FAQ on "What wallet is to be used"
Vani to make a post on the Ambassador general channel about new members joining the Gamer's Guild.
Onyeka to create visuals for the Twitter thread doc
Sucre to make the agreed changes to Dework Introductions task.

decisionItems.decision: We agreed to set a deadline (1st of December) for the Onboarding Survey Form.
Onboarding WG has agreed to test the new archives documentation tool for meeting minutes.
We agreed that our estimate of 15 mins for the completion of the survey form is about right.
We agreed to launch the survey form on the 21st of November 2023 in the Town Hall meeting, after checking it in our next meeting
We have decided to add some visuals to our Twitter thread about onboarding process.
We agreed on rewarding 10 AGIX and 50 GMBLs for completion of the Introductory task.

discussionPoints: Changes to the Onboarding survey form
Twitter thread on the Getting started doc

tags.topicsCovered: Onboarding survey, Collaboration, Town Hall update, Rewards, Getting Started twitter thread, New Onboarding video
